name: Fish n' Chill
description:
Collaborate with a fish school to enjoy your time in a chill vibe ! Attract and repel fishes around in the ocean, observe their poetic movements, pop some bubbles, and make them go inside anemones for some WOWIEEEE effect ♫. Your fish school will get bigger over time, making the moves even more harmonious.

/!\ With a large amount of fishes, the game may lag according to your computer performances. The game submitted for the jam doesn't have any fish number limit.

Controls

Left click to attract the fishes and right click to repel them. Right or left click to pop the bubbles.

Credits
  • Code: Robin Gatelier & Elisa Ayala & Eleonore
  • Art & Sounds: Jules Gatelier
  • Fish voice acting: Elisa Ayala
  • Bubble voice acting: Robin Gatelier

Music: Gymnopédie No.1 from Erik Satie. The sheet was taken here https://musescore.com/user/110059/scores/980686 and rearranged.

Color Palette used: Resurrect 64 by Kerrie Lake: https://lospec.com/palette-list/resurrect-64

Softwares
  • Game Engine: Godot Engine
  • Art: Paint.net / Krita
  • Music / Sounds: Musescore / Audacity
Install

Just download the .zip file, extract it and chill with the fishes.
